name: God of the Apocalypse
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeManhua
content: &quotIn the desperate struggle for survival in a post-apocalyptic world, everyone has awakened to a unique ability known as &#039Lexicon&#039! Zhao, who has been searching for his adopted sister, finally awakens the world&#039s only radiant-level growable Lexicon on his 16th birthday after constantly hiding and evading danger. However, the true face of this world&#039s hardship begins to reveal itself to him... Will he be able to grow successfully and find his sister?&quot
